title: Embracing Uncertainty and Reflective Growth in Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focus on how science professionals reflect on uncertainties experienced during the design thinking process and integrate design approaches into scientific problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners will identify and explain at least three causes of uncertainty arising during the design process
Learners will reconstruct uncertainty management experiences into structured narratives through narrative-based reflection
Learners will analyze personal attitudes toward uncertainty and propose new strategies for applying them to scientific problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
